name: DropOperation
desc: Operation types that determine how a drag and drop session resolves when the user drops a drag item.

items.name: case cancel
items.desc: Cancel the drag operation and transfer no data.

items.name: case copy
items.desc: Copy the data to the modified view.

items.name: case forbidden
items.desc: The drop activity is not allowed at this time or location.

items.name: case move
items.desc: Move the data represented by the drag items instead of copying it.

items.name: static func == (DropOperation, DropOperation) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two drop operations are equal.

items.name: static func != (Self, Self) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two drop operations are unequal.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of the drop operation by passing them into the given hash function.

items.name: var hashValue: Int
items.desc: The hashed value of the drop operation.
